sub_module.name: base_ipmf1
sub_module.doc: Ingress PMF_1 data. For internal DNX DATA use only. Use stage submodule instead.

define.name: nof_ffc
define.doc: Number of FFC's per context. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_ffc_groups
define.doc: Number of FFC Groups. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_one_lower
define.doc: Min FFC Index for First FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_one_upper
define.doc: Max FFC Index for First FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_two_lower
define.doc: Min FFC Index for Second FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_two_upper
define.doc: Max FFC Index for Second FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_three_lower
define.doc: Min FFC Index for Thirth FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_three_upper
define.doc: Max FFC Index for Thirth FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_four_lower
define.doc: Min FFC Index for Fourth FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: ffc_group_four_upper
define.doc: Max FFC Index for Fourth FFC Group. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_keys
define.doc: Number of keys for the this PMF stage. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_keys_alloc
define.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_keys_alloc_for_tcam
define.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage for TCAM access. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_keys_alloc_for_exem
define.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage for EXEM access. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_keys_alloc_for_mdb_dt
define.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage for MDB_DT access. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_masks_per_fes
define.doc: Number of masks per FES. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fes_id_per_array
define.doc: Number FESes in each FES array. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fes_array
define.doc: Number FES arrays. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fes_instruction_per_context
define.doc: Number of FES INSTRUCTIONs per context. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fes_programs
define.doc: Number of FES programs. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_prog_per_fes
define.doc: Number of MS bits instruction programs per FES. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: program_selection_cam_mask_nof_bits
define.doc: Number of bits for data or mask in the memory IHB_FLP_PROGRAM_SELECTION_CAM. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: cs_container_5_selected_bits_size
define.doc: Number of bits taken from general data for context selection.

define.name: nof_contexts
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF_A programs (contexts). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_link_profiles
define.doc: Number of profiles assigned to iPMF1 contexts in order to create links between iPMF1 and iPMF2 contexts. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_cs_lines
define.doc: Number of program selection lines. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_actions
define.doc: Number of actions. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_qualifiers
define.doc: Number of qualifiers. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_80B_zones
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b dedicated instruction groupsv

define.name: nof_key_zones
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zones. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_key_zone_bits
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zone bits. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fes_action
define.doc: Number of bits on the output of a FES. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fes_key_select
define.doc: Number of bits on input to FES. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fes_key_selects_on_one_actions_line
define.doc: Number of 'key select's that can go into one line on actions table.('double key' actions are considered one line). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fem_condition_ms_bit_min_value
define.doc: The minumum legal value to be set in bit select for a FEM. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fem_condition_ms_bit_max_value
define.doc: The maximum legal value to be set in bit select for a FEM. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_programs
define.doc: Number of bit in FEM program representation. This is log2 of the number of fem programs. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_programs
define.doc: Total number FEM programs available. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: log_nof_bits_in_fem_key_select
define.doc: Log2 of number of bits on one 'chunk' of input to FEM. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_key_select
define.doc: Number of bits on one 'chunk' of input to FEM. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fem_key_select_resolution_in_bits
define.doc: Number of bits in the 'step' from one 'key select' to the following. See dbal_enum_value_field_field_pmf_a_fem_key_select_e. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: log_nof_bits_in_fem_map_data_field
define.doc: Log2 of number of bits on MAP_DATA field in IPPC_FEM_MAP_INDEX_TABLE (See FIELD_PMF_A_FEM_MAP_INDEX dbal table). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_map_data_field
define.doc: Number of bits on MAP_DATA field in IPPC_FEM_MAP_INDEX_TABLE (See FIELD_PMF_A_FEM_MAP_INDEX dbal table). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action_fems_2_15
define.doc: Number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_24B_MAP_TABLE. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action_fems_0_1
define.doc: Number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_4B_MAP_TABLE. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action
define.doc: Maximal number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_*_MAP_TABLE. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_condition
define.doc: Number of bits on fem condition. This is log2 of the number of conditions that may be assigned to each (fem_id,fem_program) combination. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_condition
define.doc: Total number of fem conditions. This is the number of conditions that may be assigned to each (fem_id,fem_program) combination. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_map_index
define.doc: Number of bits on fem map index. This represents log2 of the number of actions that may be assigned to each condition. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_map_index
define.doc: Total number fem map indices. This represents the number of actions that may be assigned to each condition. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_id
define.doc: Number of bits on fem identifier. This represents the number of FEMs in the system: No. of FEMs is 2^nof_bits_in_fem_id. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_id
define.doc: Total number 'FEM id's available. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: num_fems_with_short_action
define.doc: Number of FEMs, starting from 'fem_id=0', which have only 4 bits on action value. The rest have 24 bits on action value. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: num_bits_in_fem_field_select
define.doc: Number of bits on each of the HW field marked FIELD_SELECT_MAP_*. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_id_per_array
define.doc: Number FEMes in each FEM array. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_array
define.doc: Number FEM arrays. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fems_per_context
define.doc: Number of FEMs per context. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: default_strength
define.doc: Default value for PMF strength. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_compare_pairs_in_compare_mode
define.doc: Number compare pairs in compare mode. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_compare_keys_in_compare_mode
define.doc: Number compare keys in compare mode. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: compare_key_size
define.doc: Size of the compare key in the system. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_l4_ops_ranges_legacy
define.doc: Number of ranges for L4 Ops legacy. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_ext_l4_ops_ranges
define.doc: Number of ranges for External L4 Ops. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_pkt_hdr_ranges
define.doc: Number of ranges for PKT HDR. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_out_lif_ranges
define.doc: Number of ranges for Out Lif. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fes_key_select_for_zero_bit
define.doc: The key select used for obtaining an always zero bit for input to FES (for example, using a zero padded bit). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fes_shift_for_zero_bit
define.doc: The shift used for obtaining an always zero bit for input to FES (for example, using a zero padded bit). For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: uses_small_exem
define.doc: Indicated if the stage can perform a SEXEM lookup. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: uses_large_exem
define.doc: Indicated if the stage can perform a LEXEM lookup. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: cmp_selection
define.doc: Compare selection for both keys of 2nd compare, See the CMP_SELECTION field in IPPC_PMF_GENERAL register for additional information. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: fes_instruction_size
define.doc: Number of bits in one fes instruction.

define.name: fes_pgm_id_offset
define.doc: FES Program ID offset pointing to IPPC_PMF_FES_PROGRAMm->FES_2ND_INSTRUCTION_LSB_ADDRESSf.

value.name: nof_keys_alloc_for_dir_ext
value.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage for DIRECT EXTRACTION

value.name: nof_keys_alloc_for_mdb_dt
value.doc: Number of keys available for allocation for use by this specific PMF stage for Direct Table MDB access

value.name: nof_masks_per_fes
value.doc: Number of masks per FES

value.name: nof_fes_id_per_array
value.doc: Number FESes in each FES array

value.name: nof_fes_array
value.doc: Number of FES arrays

value.name: nof_fes_instruction_per_context
value.doc: Number of FES INSTRUCTIONs per context

value.name: nof_fes_programs
value.doc: Number of FES programs

value.name: nof_prog_per_fes
value.doc: Number of MS bits instruction programs per FES

value.name: program_selection_cam_mask_nof_bits
value.doc: Number of bits for data or mask in the memory IHB_FLP_PROGRAM_SELECTION_CAM

value.name: cs_scratch_pad_size
value.doc: Number of bits taken from general data for context selection.

value.name: cs_container_5_selected_bits_size
value.doc: Number of bits taken from general data for context selection.

value.name: nof_contexts
value.doc: Number of Ingress PMF_A programs (contexts)

value.name: nof_link_profiles
value.doc: Number of profiles assigned to iPMF1 contexts in order to create links between iPMF1 and iPMF2 contexts

value.name: nof_cs_lines
value.doc: Number of program selection lines

value.name: nof_actions
value.doc: Number of actions

value.name: nof_qualifiers
value.doc: Number of qualifiers

value.name: nof_80B_zones
value.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b dedicated instruction groups

value.name: nof_key_zones
value.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zones

value.name: nof_key_zone_bits
value.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zone bits

value.name: nof_bits_in_fes_action
value.doc: Number of bits on the output of a FES.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fes_key_select
value.doc: Number of bits on input to FES.

value.name: nof_fes_key_selects_on_one_actions_line
value.doc: Number of 'key select's that can go into one line on actions table.('double key' actions are considered one line)

value.name: fem_condition_ms_bit_min_value
value.doc: The minumum legal value to be set in bit select for a FEM.

value.name: fem_condition_ms_bit_max_value
value.doc: The maximum legal value to be set in bit select for a FEM.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_programs
value.doc: Number of bit in FEM program representation. This is log2 of the number of fem programs

value.name: nof_fem_programs
value.doc: Total number FEM programs available.

value.name: log_nof_bits_in_fem_key_select
value.doc: Log2 of number of bits on one 'chunk' of input to FEM.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_key_select
value.doc: Number of bits on one 'chunk' of input to FEM.

value.name: fem_key_select_resolution_in_bits
value.doc: Number of bits in the 'step' from one 'key select' to the following. See dbal_enum_value_field_field_pmf_a_fem_key_select_e.

value.name: log_nof_bits_in_fem_map_data_field
value.doc: Log2 of number of bits on MAP_DATA field in IPPC_FEM_MAP_INDEX_TABLE (See FIELD_PMF_A_FEM_MAP_INDEX dbal table).

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_map_data_field
value.doc: Number of bits on MAP_DATA field in IPPC_FEM_MAP_INDEX_TABLE (See FIELD_PMF_A_FEM_MAP_INDEX dbal table).

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action_fems_2_15
value.doc: Number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_24B_MAP_TABLE.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action_fems_0_1
value.doc: Number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_4B_MAP_TABLE.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action
value.doc: Maximal number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_*_MAP_TABLE.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_condition
value.doc: Number of bits on fem condition. This is log2 of the number of conditions that may be assigned to each (fem_id,fem_program) combination.

value.name: nof_fem_condition
value.doc: Total number of fem conditions. This is the number of conditions that may be assigned to each (fem_id,fem_program) combination.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_map_index
value.doc: Number of bits on fem map index. This represents log2 of the number of actions that may be assigned to each condition.

value.name: nof_fem_map_index
value.doc: Total number fem map indices. This represents the number of actions that may be assigned to each condition.

value.name: nof_bits_in_fem_id
value.doc: Number of bits on fem identifier. This represents the number of FEMs in the system: No. of FEMs is 2^nof_bits_in_fem_id

value.name: nof_fem_id
value.doc: Total number 'FEM id's available.

value.name: num_fems_with_short_action
value.doc: Number of FEMs, starting from 'fem_id=0', which have only 4 bits on action value. The rest have 24 bits on action value

value.name: num_bits_in_fem_field_select
value.doc: Number of bits on each of the HW field marked FIELD_SELECT_MAP_*

value.name: nof_fem_id_per_array
value.doc: Number of FEMs in each FEM array

value.name: nof_fem_array
value.doc: Number of FEM arrays

value.name: nof_fems_per_context
value.doc: Total number of FEMs on all arrays

value.name: default_strength
value.doc: Default value for PMF strength

value.name: pbus_header_length
value.doc: Number of bits reserved in Ingress PBUS for header

value.name: nof_layer_records
value.doc: Number of layer records taken from the parser.

value.name: layer_record_size
value.doc: Number of bits in each layer record.

value.name: nof_compare_pairs_in_compare_mode
value.doc: Number compare pairs in compare mode

value.name: nof_compare_keys_in_compare_mode
value.doc: Number compare keys in compare mode

value.name: compare_key_size
value.doc: Size of the compare key in the system

value.name: nof_l4_ops_ranges_legacy
value.doc: Number of ranges for L4 Ops legacy

value.name: nof_ext_l4_ops_ranges
value.doc: Number of ranges for Extended L4 Ops

value.name: nof_pkt_hdr_ranges
value.doc: Number of ranges for PKT HDR

value.name: nof_out_lif_ranges
value.doc: Number of ranges for Out Lif

value.name: fes_key_select_for_zero_bit
value.doc: The key select used for obtaining an always zero bit for input to FES (for example, using a zero padded bit).

value.name: fes_shift_for_zero_bit
value.doc: The shift used for obtaining an always zero bit for input to FES (for example, using a zero padded bit).

value.name: uses_small_exem
value.doc: Indicated if the stage can perform a SEXEM lookup.

value.name: uses_large_exem
value.doc: Indicated if the stage can perform a LEXEM lookup.

value.name: cmp_selection
value.doc: Compare selection for both keys of 2nd compare, See the CMP_SELECTION field in IPPC_PMF_GENERAL register for additional information

value.name: nof_bits_main_pbus
value.doc: Number of bits in the main PBUS of the stage (the one used by METADATA qualifiers). Only iPMF2 uses the iPMF1 PBUs as it's main PBUS.

value.name: nof_bits_native_pbus
value.doc: Number of bits in the native PBUS of the stage, if it is different from the main PBUS. Only iPMF2 has a separate native PBUS.

define.name: nof_fgs
define.doc: Number of External TCAM Field Groups

define.name: max_single_key_size
define.doc: Maximum single key size

define.name: nof_acl_keys_master_max
define.doc: The maximum number of keys that can be used by ACL (not FWD) in KBP for a single context

define.name: nof_acl_keys_fg_max
define.doc: The maximum number of keys that can be used by ACL (not FWD) in KBP for a single field group

define.name: min_acl_nof_ffc
define.doc: Minimum number of FFC's that should be allocated for each context for ACL purposes.

define.name: max_fwd_context_num_for_one_apptype
define.doc: Maximum number of fwd contexts that could be mapped to an apptype

define.name: max_acl_context_num
define.doc: Maximum number of ACL contexts in the KBP

define.name: size_apptype_profile_id
define.doc: Size in bits of the apptype profile ID (based on iFED2 ACL context)

define.name: key_bmp
define.doc: bitmap of the key IDs used by the KBP.

define.name: apptype_user_1st
define.doc: First User defined Apptype id to avoid overlapping with static ones

define.name: apptype_user_nof
define.doc: Number of user Defined apptypes that can be created

define.name: max_payload_size_per_opcode
define.doc: The total payload size of the KBP

table.name: ffc_to_quad_and_group_map
table.doc: Mapping of the ffc id to its quad anad group

value.name: quad_id
value.doc: Id of the relevant quad for the given ffc id

value.name: group_id
value.doc: Id of the relevant group for the given ffc id

define.name: key_size_half
define.doc: Half TCAM key size

define.name: key_size_single
define.doc: Single TCAM key size

define.name: key_size_double
define.doc: Double TCAM key size

define.name: dt_max_key_size
define.doc: Maximum key size for TCAM DT

define.name: action_size_half
define.doc: When the key size is half key (80b), this holds the action width payload

define.name: action_size_single
define.doc: When the key size is single key (160b), this holds the action width payload

define.name: action_size_double
define.doc: When the key size is double key (320b), this holds the action width payload

define.name: key_mode_size
define.doc: Number of bits representing the entry size for each half entry.

define.name: entry_size_single_key_hw
define.doc: The full key size in HW, includingd entry size field, not including payload and valid bits.

define.name: entry_size_single_valid_bits_hw
define.doc: The size of the valid bits in HW.

define.name: entry_size_half_payload_hw
define.doc: The full payload size in HW for half an entry.

define.name: hw_bank_size
define.doc: Size of a TCAM bank in HW

define.name: small_bank_size
define.doc: Number of entries per small TCAM bank

define.name: nof_big_bank_lines
define.doc: Number of TCAM big bank lines

define.name: nof_small_bank_lines
define.doc: Number of TCAM small bank lines

define.name: nof_big_banks
define.doc: Number of TCAM big banks

define.name: nof_small_banks
define.doc: Number of TCAM small banks

define.name: nof_banks
define.doc: Number of TCAM banks

define.name: nof_payload_tables
define.doc: Number of action tables

define.name: nof_access_profiles
define.doc: Number of TCAM access profiles

define.name: action_width_selector_size
define.doc: The action width selector size for each bank in each access profile, each bit represents the corresponding 32 bit in the action table

define.name: cascaded_data_nof_bits
define.doc: Number of TCAM cascaded data bits

define.name: big_bank_key_nof_bits
define.doc: Number of TCAM big bank key bits

define.name: nof_entries_160_bits
define.doc: Number of 160 bits TCAM entries; Value: (nof_big_banks*nof_big_bank_lines)+(nof_small_banks*nof_small_bank_lines)

define.name: nof_entries_80_bits
define.doc: Number of 80 bits TCAM entries; Value: (2*nof_big_banks*nof_big_bank_lines)+(2*nof_small_banks*nof_small_bank_lines)

define.name: tcam_banks_size
define.doc: The size of TCAM_TCAM_BANK which is equal to (nof_big_banks + nof_small_banks) * nof_big_bank_lines

define.name: tcam_banks_last_index
define.doc: Last index available in TCAM banks

define.name: nof_tcam_handlers
define.doc: Number of TCAM handlers in device

define.name: max_prefix_size
define.doc: Maximum prefix size in TCAM

define.name: max_prefix_value
define.doc: Maximum prefix value in TCAM

define.name: nof_keys_in_double_key
define.doc: Number of 160'b key's in double key

define.name: nof_keys_max
define.doc: Number of 160'b key's in one search lookup

define.name: access_profile_half_key_mode
define.doc: Half key mode in access profile

define.name: access_profile_single_key_mode
define.doc: Single key mode in access profile

define.name: access_profile_double_key_mode
define.doc: Double key mode in access profile

define.name: hit_indication_entries_per_byte
define.doc: Number of entries in byte, in TCAM and CS TCAM HIT and indication memories.

define.name: max_tcam_priority
define.doc: The biggest valid value for the priority of a TCAM entry

define.name: nof_fgs
define.doc: Number of Field Groups

define.name: nof_action_per_fg
define.doc: Number of action per Field Group

define.name: nof_quals_per_fg
define.doc: Number of qualifiers per Field Group

define.name: nof_keys_per_fg_max
define.doc: Maximum number of keys (KBRs) a field group can have.

define.name: id_fec_wa
define.doc: FEC WA is being used in more then one WA context, hence must be created with_id so that other WA can re-use the FG

define.name: max_nof_key_selects_per_field_io
define.doc: Number of key selects in table for each field IO

table.name: key_select_properties
table.doc: The properties of the different key select options

key.name: field_io
key.doc: Identifies the source of the information

value.name: key_select
value.doc: Represents the DBAL key select enums of the different stages

value.name: num_bits
value.doc: Number of bits on key select for field IO. If zero than entry is invalid.

value.name: lsb
value.doc: The offset on the field IO of the key select

value.name: num_bits_not_on_key
value.doc: The number of LS bits on key select not on the field IO

define.name: max_nof_key_selects_per_field_io
define.doc: Number of key selects in table for each field IO

table.name: key_select_properties
table.doc: The properties of the different key select options

key.name: field_io
key.doc: Identifies the source of the information

value.name: key_select
value.doc: Represents the DBAL key select enums of the different stages

value.name: num_bits
value.doc: Number of bits on key select for field IO. If zero than entry is invalid.

value.name: lsb
value.doc: The offset on the field IO of the key select

value.name: num_bits_not_on_key
value.doc: The number of LS bits on key select not on the field IO

define.name: default_context

define.name: default_itmh_context

define.name: default_j1_itmh_context

define.name: default_j1_itmh_pph_context
define.doc: Default Context Id for J1 ITMH_PPH Packets

define.name: default_stacking_context
define.doc: Default Context Id for Stacking Packets

define.name: default_oam_context
define.doc: Default Context Id for OAM Packets

define.name: default_oam_reflector_context
define.doc: Default Context Id for OAM downmep reflector Packets

define.name: default_j1_learning_2ndpass_context
define.doc: Default Context Id for 2nd pass of J1 Learning WA

define.name: user_1st
define.doc: First User qualifier id to avoid overlapping with static ones

define.name: user_nof
define.doc: Number of User Define Data qualifiers that can be created

define.name: vw_1st
define.doc: First VW qualifier id to avoid overlapping with static or user defined qualifiers

define.name: vw_nof
define.doc: Number of VW qualifiers that can be created

define.name: max_bits_in_qual
define.doc: Maximum number of bits that any qualifier can have

define.name: ingress_pbus_header_length
define.doc: Number of bits reserved in ingress PBUS for header.

define.name: egress_pbus_header_length
define.doc: Number of bits reserved in egress PBUS for header.

define.name: ifwd2_pbus_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the PBUS of iFWD2

define.name: ipmf1_pbus_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the PBUS of iPMF1

define.name: ipmf2_pbus_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the PBUS of iPMF3

define.name: ipmf3_pbus_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the PBUS of iPMF3

define.name: epmf_pbus_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the PBUS of ePMF

define.name: ingress_nof_layer_records
define.doc: Number of layer records taken from the parser in ingress stages.

define.name: ingress_layer_record_size
define.doc: Number of bits in each layer record in ingress stages.

define.name: egress_nof_layer_records
define.doc: Number of layer records taken from the parser in egress stages.

define.name: egress_layer_record_size
define.doc: Number of bits in each layer record in egress stages.

define.name: ac_lif_wide_size
define.doc: Size of AC_LIF_WIDE data size

value.name: offset
value.doc: offset on PBUS

value.name: signal
value.doc: signal representing specific qualifier on stage entry

table.name: layer_record_info_ingress
table.doc: Information about layer record qualifiers in the ingress

value.name: valid
value.doc: Whether the layer record is supported on the device

value.name: size
value.doc: The size of the qualifier in bits

value.name: offset
value.doc: The lsb of the qualifier within the layer record

table.name: layer_record_info_egress
table.doc: Information about layer record qualifiers in the egress

value.name: valid
value.doc: Whether the layer record is supported on the device

value.name: size
value.doc: The size of the qualifier in bits

value.name: offset
value.doc: The lsb of the qualifier within the layer record

define.name: user_1st
define.doc: First user action id to avaoid overlapping with static ones

define.name: user_nof
define.doc: Number of User Define Data actions that can be created

define.name: vw_1st
define.doc: First VW action id to avoid overlapping with static or user defined qualifiers

define.name: vw_nof
define.doc: Number of VW action that can be created

define.name: signals_nof
define.doc: Number of elements in the table vw_quals.

define.name: actions_per_signal_nof
define.doc: Maximum number of actions that write to a signal.

define.name: general_data_user_general_containers_size
define.doc: The size in bits of the user_general part of the general_data (before the comp_general_data part).

define.name: ipmf1_general_data_index
define.doc: The index in signal_qual_mapping table of the general data signal for iPMF1.

table.name: signal_mapping
table.doc: Per stage per signal, how it maps to standard 1 qualifiers and actions

key.name: signal_id
key.doc: A local index for the entry

value.name: signal_name
value.doc: Name of the signal.

value.name: mapped_qual
value.doc: Standard 1 qualifier that correlates to the signal

value.name: offset_from_qual
value.doc: Offset on from the start of the standard 1 qualifier

value.name: mapped_action
value.doc: Standard 1 action that correlates to the signal

value.name: action_offset
value.doc: Offset on from the start of the signal for the action

define.name: nof_ing_in_lif
define.doc: Number of reserved bits for Ingress FP in in_lif_profile

define.name: nof_eg_in_lif
define.doc: Number of reserved bits for Egress FP in in_lif_profile

define.name: nof_ing_eth_rif
define.doc: Number of reserved bits for Ingress FP in in_rif_profile

define.name: nof_eg_eth_rif
define.doc: Number of reserved bits for Egress FP in in_rif_profile

define.name: ingress_pp_port_key_gen_var_size
define.doc: Number of bits available on the key_ken_per per PP port

define.name: max_port_profile_size
define.doc: The maximum number in bits of all port profiles hw memories possible

define.name: nof_bits_in_port_profile
define.doc: The number of bits used by the PMF for port profiles. Note that the actual number may be lower in some stages.

define.name: nof_bits_in_ingress_pp_port_general_data
define.doc: The number of bits used by the PMF for per PP port general data.

numeric.name: pmf_sexem3_stage
numeric.doc: Determines using SOC property if we use SEXEM3 in iPMF2 or iPMF3.

numeric.name: pmf_map_stage
numeric.doc: Determines using SOC property if we use MAP in iPMF1/iPMF2 or iPMF3.

define.name: half_key_size
define.doc: Half key size of direct extraction

define.name: single_key_size
define.doc: Single key size of direct extraction

define.name: double_key_size
define.doc: Double key size of direct extraction

define.name: key_size
define.doc: Size of the state table key in the system

define.name: address_max
define.doc: Max address for the state table

define.name: address_size
define.doc: Size of the address field in State Table in bits

define.name: data_size
define.doc: Size of the data field in State Table in bits

define.name: key_size
define.doc: Size of the MAP key in the system

define.name: action_size_small
define.doc: Size of the small MAP action in the system

define.name: action_size_mid
define.doc: Size of the mid MAP action in the system

define.name: action_size_large
define.doc: Size of the large MAP action in the system

define.name: ipmf1_key_select
define.doc: The PMF key used for MAP lookup by iPMF1. The value is the offset from the first key in the stage.

define.name: ipmf2_key_select
define.doc: The PMF key used for MAP lookup by iPMF2. The value is the offset from the first key in the stage.

define.name: ipmf3_key_select
define.doc: The PMF key used for MAP lookup by iPMF3. The value is the offset from the first key in the stage.

define.name: max_key_size
define.doc: maximal key size Field Group type

define.name: type_count
define.doc: UDH Type count

define.name: type_0_length
define.doc: UDH Type 0 length in bytes

define.name: type_1_length
define.doc: UDH Type 1 length in bytes

define.name: type_2_length
define.doc: UDH Type 2 length in bytes

define.name: type_3_length
define.doc: UDH Type 3 length in bytes

define.name: nof_profiles
define.doc: Number of system headers in device

numeric.name: pph_learn_ext_disable
numeric.doc: Never add learn_ext in system headers unlesee FP required. Used by default header_profile only.

table.name: system_header_profiles
table.doc: Contains all system headers profiles defined in this device

value.name: name
value.doc: profile name

value.name: build_ftmh
value.doc: Defines whether to build FTMH header or not

value.name: build_tsh
value.doc: Defines whether to build TSH header or not

value.name: build_pph
value.doc: Defines whether to build PPH header or not

value.name: build_udh
value.doc: Defines whether to build UDH header or not

value.name: never_add_pph_learn_ext
value.doc: Defines whether to never add PPH Learn Ext.

define.name: small_app_db_id_size
define.doc: Number of bits used application db

define.name: large_app_db_id_size
define.doc: Number of bits used application db

define.name: small_max_key_size
define.doc: Small EXEM key size in bits

define.name: large_max_key_size
define.doc: Large EXEM key size in bits

define.name: small_max_result_size
define.doc: Small EXEM result (payload) size in bits, including VMV

define.name: large_max_result_size
define.doc: Large EXEM result (payload) size in bits, including VMV

define.name: small_max_container_size
define.doc: Large EXEM maximal container size in bits

define.name: large_max_container_size
define.doc: Large EXEM result (payload) size in bits

define.name: small_key_hash_size
define.doc: number of bits out of key used for hashing (these bits are spared from saving in container)

define.name: large_key_hash_size
define.doc: number of bits out of key used for hashing (these bits are spared from saving in container)

define.name: small_min_app_db_id_range
define.doc: Small EXEM first APP_DB_ID allocated to PMF module

define.name: large_min_app_db_id_range
define.doc: Large EXEM first APP_DB_ID allocated to PMF module

define.name: small_max_app_db_id_range
define.doc: Small EXEM last APP_DB_ID allocated to PMF module

define.name: large_max_app_db_id_range
define.doc: Large EXEM last APP_DB_ID allocated to PMF module

define.name: small_ipmf2_key
define.doc: The PMF key used for EXEM lookup by iPMF2. The value is the offset from the first key in the stage.

define.name: small_ipmf2_key_part
define.doc: The PMF key part used for EXEM lookup by iPMF2. 0 means the LSB half, 1 the MSB half.

define.name: small_ipmf2_key_hw_value
define.doc: The HW value to provide for selecting small_ipmf2_key and small_ipmf2_key_part.

define.name: small_ipmf2_key_hw_bits
define.doc: The number of bits used by the HW for selecting small_ipmf2_key and small_ipmf2_key_part.

define.name: large_ipmf1_key_configurable
define.doc: Whether or not the EXEM key for iPMF1 can be configured on a chip wide basis.

define.name: large_ipmf1_key
define.doc: The PMF key used for EXEM lookup by iPMF1. The value is the offset from the first key in the stage.

sub_module.name: ace
sub_module.doc: ACE values, for ACE expansion done by the PPMC DB and ACE ACR, for both MC replication ID pointers and ACE pointers

define.name: ace_id_size
define.doc: Number of bits used for the ACE ID (result type), which serves as an ID for the ACE format and context ID for the ACE EFES.

define.name: key_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the key of the PPMC table, including the prefix that indicates the type to the entry

define.name: key_hash_size
define.doc: Number of bits in the key that are only used in the hash and aren't placed in the entry.

define.name: app_db_id_size
define.doc: Number of bits Used for the APP DB ID.

define.name: payload_size
define.doc: Number of bits used to encode the container size, including the result type

define.name: min_key_range_pmf
define.doc: The first entry in the range of ACE keys allocated to ACE pointers (but not to MC replication ID).

define.name: max_key_range_pmf
define.doc: The last entry in the range of ACE keys allocated to ACE pointers (but not to MC replication ID).

define.name: min_ace_id_dynamic_range
define.doc: Minimal number of ACE ID that can be allocated dynamically.

define.name: nof_ace_id
define.doc: Number of ACE IDs.

define.name: nof_action_per_ace_format
define.doc: Number of action per ACE Format

define.name: row_size
define.doc: Number of bits per raw, entry size is number row size times VMV encoding meaning, e.g. half row encoding VMV would mean 60 bits entry size.

define.name: min_entry_size
define.doc: Minimum number of bits in entry.

define.name: ace_id_pmf_alloc_first
define.doc: The first ACE ID allocated to ACE, that is to ePMF extension.

define.name: ace_id_pmf_alloc_last
define.doc: The last ACE ID allocated to ACE, that is to ePMF extension.

define.name: nof_masks_per_fes
define.doc: Number of masks per FES

define.name: nof_fes_id_per_array
define.doc: Number FESes in each FES array

define.name: nof_fes_array
define.doc: Number FES arrays

define.name: nof_fes_instruction_per_context
define.doc: Number of FES INSTRUCTIONs per ACE ID, also the number of FESes.

define.name: nof_fes_programs
define.doc: Number of FES programs. For ACE the FES program is the same as ACE ID. Used here for compatibility with PMF FESes.

define.name: nof_prog_per_fes
define.doc: Number of MS bits instruction programs per FES

define.name: nof_bits_in_fes_action
define.doc: Number of bits on the output of a FES.

define.name: fes_shift_for_zero_bit
define.doc: The shift used for obtaining an always zero bit for input to FES. Uses the zero padding at the end of the payload, expected to work only if EFES field type=1.

define.name: fes_instruction_size
define.doc: Number of bits in one fes instruction.

define.name: fes_shift_offset
define.doc: FES shift offset in ETPPA_PRP_FES_PROGRAM_TABLEm->DATA_PER_FESf

define.name: fes_invalid_bits_offset
define.doc: FES invalid bits offset in ETPPA_PRP_FES_PROGRAM_TABLEm->DATA_PER_FESf

define.name: fes_type_offset
define.doc: FES type offset in ETPPA_PRP_FES_PROGRAM_TABLEm->DATA_PER_FESf

define.name: fes_ace_action_offset
define.doc: FES ace action offset in ETPPA_PRP_FES_PROGRAM_TABLEm->DATA_PER_FESf

define.name: fes_chosen_mask_offset
define.doc: FES chosen mask offset in ETPPA_PRP_FES_PROGRAM_TABLEm->DATA_PER_FESf

define.name: dir_ext_nof_fields
define.doc:
The maximum number of fields in a direct extraction request. 
 (e.g. if we want the action to be composed of 3 bits of constant value, 5 bits from the key, 
 5 bits of constant value and then 4 bits from the key we need at least 4 fields.)
 Used by dnx_field_dir_ext_action_t for the array size of the fields. 
 Arbitrary value, can be increased.

define.name: nof_action_params_per_entry
define.doc: Number of action parameters can be given for each action \n e.g. action values that are filled for TCAM action result

define.name: nof_qual_params_per_entry
define.doc: Number of qualifiers parameters can be given for each qualifier type \n e.g. qualifier/key values that are filled for TCAM key

define.name: udp_position
define.doc: The position of the UDP protocol in the register

define.name: tcp_position
define.doc: The position of the UDP protocol in the register

define.name: nof_range_entries
define.doc: number of range entries in L4 Ops

define.name: nof_ext_encoders
define.doc: Number of range result encoders in extended L4 OPs

define.name: nof_ext_types
define.doc: Number of range types in extended L4 OPs

define.name: trap_strength_offset
define.doc: The offset of the Trap Strength in the action

define.name: trap_qualifier_offset
define.doc: The offset of the Trap Qualifier in the action

define.name: sniff_qualifier_offset
define.doc: The offset of the Snoop qualifier in the action

define.name: mirror_qualifier_offset
define.doc: The offset of the Mirror Qualifier in the action

define.name: equal
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the result of compare is equal

define.name: not_equal
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the result of compare is not equal

define.name: smaller
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the first compare value is smaller then the second

define.name: not_smaller
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the first compare value is not smaller then the second

define.name: bigger
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the first compare value is bigger then the second

define.name: not_bigger
define.doc: The position in the qual showing that the first compare value is not bigger then the second

define.name: nof_operands
define.doc: The number of all operands

sub_module.name: diag
sub_module.doc: Field diagnostics related defines and features.

feature.name: tcam_cs_hit_bit_support
feature.doc: Indicates if the TCAM Context Selection hit bit indication is supported.

define.name: bytes_to_remove_mask
define.doc: Mask of bits, which are related to the value of bytes to remove, from the signal.

define.name: layers_to_remove_size_in_bit
define.doc: Size of the layers to remove value in bits, to be used for shifting the signal value.

define.name: layers_to_remove_mask
define.doc: Mask of bits, which are related to the value of layers to remove, from the signal.

define.name: nof_signals_per_action
define.doc: Maximum number of signals per action.

define.name: nof_signals_per_qualifier
define.doc: Maximum number of signals per qualifier.

sub_module.name: common_max_val
sub_module.doc: Common max values over all PMF stages (IPMF1/IPMF2/IPMF3/EPMF) or over all IO types (TCAM, EXAM, ...)

define.name: nof_ffc
define.doc: Maximal number of FFC's in all stages

define.name: nof_keys
define.doc: Number of keys for the entire PMF module

define.name: nof_masks_per_fes
define.doc: Number of masks per FES

define.name: nof_fes_id_per_array
define.doc: Number FESes in each FES array

define.name: nof_fes_array
define.doc: Number FES arrays

define.name: nof_fes_instruction_per_context
define.doc: Number of FES INSTRUCTIONs per context

define.name: nof_fes_programs
define.doc: Number of FES programs

define.name: nof_prog_per_fes
define.doc: Number of MS bits instruction programs per FES

define.name: nof_program_selection_lines
define.doc: Number of Ingress context selection lines

define.name: program_selection_cam_mask_nof_bits
define.doc: Number of bits for data or mask in the memory IHB_FLP_PROGRAM_SELECTION_CAM

define.name: nof_cs_lines
define.doc: Number of program selection lines

define.name: nof_contexts
define.doc: Number of contexts per PMF

define.name: nof_actions
define.doc: Number of actions

define.name: nof_qualifiers
define.doc: Number of qualifiers

define.name: nof_80B_zones
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b dedicated instruction groups

define.name: nof_key_zones
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zones

define.name: nof_key_zone_bits
define.doc: Number of Ingress PMF 80b key zone bits

define.name: nof_bits_in_fes_action
define.doc: Number of bits on the outpus of a FES.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fes_key_select
define.doc: Number of bits on input to FES.

define.name: nof_fes_key_selects_on_one_actions_line
define.doc: Number of 'key select's that can be applied on one line on actions table. ('double key' actions are considered one line)

define.name: nof_ffc_in_qual
define.doc: Maximal number of ffc for one qualifier.

define.name: nof_bits_in_ffc
define.doc: Number of bits in ffc.

define.name: nof_ffc_in_uint32
define.doc: Number of uint32 needed to hold bitmap for maximum number of FFC's.

define.name: nof_action_per_group
define.doc: Maxmimal number of actions between both Field Group and ACE format. Used for arrays in functions that serve both.

define.name: nof_layer_records
define.doc: Maximal number of layer records.

define.name: layer_record_size
define.doc: Maximal size of layer records.

define.name: nof_l4_ops_ranges_legacy
define.doc: Maximal number of ranges for L4 Ops legacy.

define.name: nof_pkt_hdr_ranges
define.doc: Maximal number of ranges for packet header.

define.name: nof_out_lif_ranges
define.doc: Maximal number of ranges for Out Lif.

define.name: kbr_size
define.doc: Maximal KBR size.

define.name: nof_compare_pairs
define.doc: Maximal number of pairs used for compare.

define.name: nof_compare_pairs_in_compare_mode
define.doc: Number compare pairs in compare mode.

define.name: nof_compare_keys_in_compare_mode
define.doc: Number compare keys in compare mode.

define.name: nof_bits_in_fem_action
define.doc: Maximal number of bits on action value in IPPC_FEM_*_*_MAP_TABLE.

define.name: nof_fem_condition
define.doc: Total number of fem conditions. This is the number of conditions that may be assigned to each (fem_id,fem_program) combination.

define.name: nof_fem_map_index
define.doc: Total number fem map indices. This represents the number of actions that may be assigned to each condition. For internal DNX_DATA use only.

define.name: nof_fem_id
define.doc: Total number 'FEM id's available.

define.name: nof_array_ids
define.doc: Total number of 'array_is's which are used to identify a range of FESes or FEMs. See BCM_FIELD_ACTION_POSITION.

define.name: dbal_pairs
define.doc: Maximum number of pairs which are used to identify the DBAL key/result field in dnx_field_dbal_entry_set function.

table.name: array_id_type
table.doc: Contains indications on whether a specific 'array_id' is for FESes or for FEMs

value.name: is_fes
value.doc: Non-zero if 'array_id' is for FESes. Zero otherwise

value.name: is_fem
value.doc: Non-zero if 'array_id' is for FEMs. Zero otherwise

value.name: fes_array_index
value.doc: Converts 'array_id' to number of FES arrays so far. 'array_id' 0 converts to 0, 2 converts to 1

value.name: fem_array_index
value.doc: Converts 'array_id' to number of FEM arrays so far. 'array_id' 1 converts to 0, 3 converts to 1

sub_module.name: init
sub_module.doc: Field defines and features related to init.

define.name: wa_fec_dest
define.doc: APP WA for fec destination

define.name: wa_l4_trap
define.doc: APP WA for L4 Trap

define.name: wa_oam_layer_index
define.doc: APP WA for OAM Layer Index

define.name: wa_oam_stat
define.doc: APP WA for OAM Statistics

define.name: wa_flow_id
define.doc: APP WA for Flow ID

define.name: wa_roo
define.doc: APP WA for Roo

define.name: wa_jr1_ipmc_inlif
define.doc: APP WA for IPMC In LIF

define.name: wa_j1_same_port
define.doc: APP WA for J1 Same port

define.name: wa_j1_learning
define.doc: APP WA for J1 Learning

define.name: wa_learn_limit
define.doc: APP WA for Learn Limit

define.name: wa_j1_php
define.doc: APP WA for J1 MPLS PHP

define.name: ecc_wa_enable
define.doc: ECC is calculated per whole entry on each entry write, therefore, when writing half-entries\n wrong ECC values is being calculated, this workaround enables read-modify-write of the whole\n entry instead of writing half-entries to have correct ECC calculated on each write.

define.name: switch_to_acl_context
define.doc: Allows to swap the acl_context and fwd_context signals after iPMF1/2 using IPPC_PMF_GENERAL.SWITCH_TO_ACL_CONTEXT.

define.name: per_pp_port_pmf_profile_cs_offset
define.doc: The placement of PMF_PROFILE field within ERPP_PER_PORT_TABLE. Used because DBAL mapping by device didn't work.

define.name: tcam_result_flip_eco
define.doc: The TCAM result flip ECO is about flippiing lsb and msb parts of the TCAM-result in order to support 80b result being parsed by ARR

define.name: tcam_result_half_payload_on_msb
define.doc: Indicates that for half payload lookup the result is on the MSB half, but not using the tcam_result_flip_eco.

define.name: parsing_start_offset_msb_meaningless
define.doc: In JR2, the parsing_start_offset signal is 8 bit in ingress but only 7 in egress, so we make the action smaller so as not to have a meaningles MSB.

define.name: kbp_opcode_in_ipmf1_cs
define.doc: Indicates whether the context selection of iPMF1 takes the KBP opcode into account.

define.name: kbp_hitbits_correct_in_ipmf1_cs
define.doc: Indicates whether the context selection of iPMF1 takes the KBP hitbits from the correct place of the elk payload. Assumed to be either 0 or 1.

define.name: exem_vmv_removable_from_payload
define.doc: Indicates whether it is possible to configure a shift to remove the from the EXEM payload.

define.name: multiple_dynamic_mem_enablers
define.doc: Indicates whether it is possible to configure dynamic memory enablers for ST, CS hit, TCAM entry protection etc.

define.name: aacl_super_group_handler_enable
define.doc: Indicates whether it is possible to configure Super Group Handler for AACL

define.name: aacl_tcam_swap_enable
define.doc: Indicates whether it is possible to configure TCAM swap for AACL

define.name: extended_l4_ops
define.doc: Whether extended L4 Ops is supported

sub_module.name: signal_sizes
sub_module.doc: signal sizes that change by device, as needed for qualifier and action sizes.

define.name: dual_queue_size
define.doc: Dual queue added by HWJERICHO2C-55 and increased in size in HWJERICHO2P-127. Not supported in J2, but we still configure a value because the DBAL field needs a size.

define.name: packet_header_size
define.doc: packet_header_size. Changed in HWJERICHO2P-384.

define.name: ecn
define.doc: ECN signal. Changed in HWJERICHO2C-565.

define.name: congestion_info
define.doc: CONGESTION_INFO signal. Takes ECN by default, and changed with it.

sub_module.name: dnx_data_internal
sub_module.doc: For internal DNX DATA usage only

define.name: lr_eth_is_da_mac_valid
define.doc: Whether layer record ETH_IS_DA_MAC works on device (works on JR2_B0 but not on JR2_A0).
